snippet: For years, fans could only yearn for the nostalgic pleasure of watching 18 or more consecutive innings during a single afternoon. Few thought such an event was possible in 2014.
abstract: Rainout results in rare single-admission double header between New York Yankees and Pittsburgh Pirates, event that has not occurred at Yankee Stadium since 1997.
lead_paragraph: For years, fans could only yearn for the nostalgic pleasure of watching 18 or more consecutive innings during a single afternoon. Few thought such an event was possible in 2014.

headline.main: Scheduling Oddity Is Product of Rainout
